title: btt22 0.0.0.9000
text: Renamed btt_reset() btt_reset_hard(). (#12) Added function get new files state ussie, btt_get(). (#7) Must run directory within R package called ussie. Added function reset state ussie, btt_reset(). (#5) Must run directory within R package called ussie. R directory tests directory Imports Suggests fields DESCRIPTION file Automatic loading unloading ussie repo. (#3) Added .onLoad(), .unLoad() functions ussie repo placed temporary directory. Currently, package downloads ussie repo GitHub time loads; ussie branches stable, can include ussie.tar.gz inst folder package. Added internal function path_repo(), returns (temporary) path ussie repo user’s temp directory. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
